# Prep of Illegal Oil Spill pressure data layer

### 1 Data 
Data were downloaded from [HELCOM's Baltic Sea Pressures and Human Activities Map Service](http://maps.helcom.fi/website/Pressures/index.html). Data were under the tab 'Maritime & Response' then 'Illegal Oil Discharges'

<!-- dataset save location BHI_share/BHI 2.0/Pressure/illegal_oil -->
```{r echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
tab <- t(data.frame(
  c("Shipping:", "Illegal oil discharges")))

colnames(tab) <- c("Option", "Specification")
rownames(tab) <- NULL

knitr::kable(tab, caption = "Source: [HELCOM Map and Data Service](https://maps.helcom.fi/website/mapservice/) <br/> Downloaded 21 August 2020 by Andrea De Cervo") 
```

Further information about illegal discharges of oil in the Baltic Sea area and HELCOM aerial surveillance activities can be found at http://www.helcom.fi/baltic-sea-trends/maritime/illegal-spills/

Data are available from 1998-2017.
